dmca.title: R4183 - DMCA Complaint from IFPI
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Notices [mailto:Notices@ifpi.org] 
Sent: Friday, January 28, 2005 3:37 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: R4183 - DMCA Complaint from IFPI

Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

Best Regards

Mr Paul Mitchell
Internet Anti-Piracy Administrator
IFPI Secretariat
54 Regent Street
London W1B 5RE
United Kingdom

Tel: +44 (0)20 7878 7915
Fax: +44 (0)20 7878 6832
E-mail: Notices@ifpi.org
Website: www.ifpi.org

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 17, 2005 4:46 PM
To: Notices
Subject: R4183 - DMCA Complaint from IFPI

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2005 1:43 PM
To: Notices
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice (Ref: R4183)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

N> 07 January 2005

N> Lance Crosby
N> Theplanet.com Internet Services
N> 1333 North Stemmons Freeway
N> Suite 110
N> Dallas
N> 75207
N> United States
N> Telephone: +1 854-7679
N> E-mail: abuse@theplanet.com
N> E-mail: copyright@theplanet.com

N> Ref: R4183
N> Re:
N> http://www.blackrose.yeuamnhac.com//Albums/

N> Dear Lance Crosby,

N> I am contacting you on behalf of the International Federation of the 
N> Phonographic Industry (IFPI) and its member record companies.  The 
N> IFPI
is
N> a trade association whose member companies are some 1,450 major and 
N> independent record companies in the US and internationally who 
N> create, manufacture and distribute sound recordings. Under penalty of 
N> perjury, we submit that the IFPI is authorized to act on behalf of 
N> its member companies in matters involving the infringement of their 
N> sound
recordings,
N> including enforcing their copyrights and common law rights on the 
N> Internet.

N> We have learned that your service is hosting infringing files on its 
N> network (see above-referenced directory).  These files contain sound 
N> recordings by the artists known as Brosis, Eminem, Rammstein, Nelly 
N> and Sarah Connor.  These sound recordings are owned by some of our 
N> member companies and have not been authorized for this kind of use.  
N> We have a good faith belief that the above-described activity is not 
N> authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  We assert 
N> that the information in this notification is accurate, based upon the 
N> data available to us.

N> We are asking for your immediate assistance in stopping this 
N> unauthorized activity.  Specifically, we request that you remove the 
N> infringing files from your system or that you disable access to the 
N> infringing files.  In addition, please inform the site operator of 
N> the illegality of his or her conduct.

N> You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that
this
N> site operator may be liable for the infringing activity occurring on 
N> your service. In addition, under the Digital Millennium Copyright 
N> Act, if you ignore this notice, you and/or your company may also be 
N> liable for any resulting infringement. This letter does not 
N> constitute a waiver of any right to recover damages incurred by 
N> virtue of any such unauthorized activities, and such rights as well 
N> as claims for other relief are expressly retained.

N> You may contact me at IFPI Secretariat, 54 Regent Street, London W1B 
N> 5RE, United Kingdom or email Notices@ifpi.org, to discuss this 
N> notice.  We await your response.

N> Sincerely,





N> Mr Paul Mitchell

N> Internet Anti-Piracy Administrator
N> IFPI Secretariat
N> 54 Regent Street

N> London W1B 5RE

N> United Kingdom

N> Tel: +44 (0)20 7878 7915

N> Fax: +44 (0)20 7878 6832

N> E-mail: Notices@ifpi.org
N> Website:  <http://www.ifpi.org/> www.ifpi.org
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB3uZZvK/XpJs6oyURAoLNAJ9hXWy/GrOOn4WSh2ntaQo0trLkxgCgkXUy
ozrAIPKwiLSUq5VKJ03kmaM=
=ppa0
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
